0.title: Squadron vehicles: Hunter F.58
0.description: The Swiss version of the iconic British Hawker Hunter jet fighter, melding air-to-air and air-to-surface missiles. The Hunter, versatile like never before, will be yours for free for squadron activity points!

1.title: New effects for aviation in the Sky Guardians update
1.description: A little sneak peek of the new visual and physical improvements in War Thunder aviation that will be introduced into the game with the upcoming Sky Guardians update!

2.title: Dev team replies to community feedback on the Sky Guardians update
2.description: The War Thunder development team reacts on the hottest topics of discussion of the upcoming Sky Guardians update.

0.title: Pages of History (March)
0.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon.

1.title: World War Mode news
1.description: We would like to present to you the next batch of changes in the “World War” game mode and inform you about the upcoming opportunity to test your skill in historical battles.

2.title: Pages of History (February)
2.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon

0.title: War Thunder "Sky Guardians" - Changelog
0.description: The first units for the French naval tree, new and updated graphical effects and data structure optimization  along with ejection seats for selected modern jets. Amongst the 43 new as well as updated vehicle models, one can't help but mention the real behemoth - the Char2, the agile AH-6M "Little Bird" helicopter or the first French light cruiser; Duguay-Trouin!. In addition to all this, the winter version of the location "Seversk", a new location for fans of avionics - Pyrenees, and as always, many improvements and fixes! Let's welcome the "Sky Guardians" update!

1.title: Server Update 09.03.2023
1.description: The maximum possible number of players for each team in aircraft RB has been changed from 12 to 16.

2.title: Update 2.25.0.15
2.description: A bug that caused second team fighters to not respawn correctly in missions of the type [Operation] has been fixed.
